moves.1. e4: These annotations are for IC Dogs team members, but everyone else is welcome to them as well.
moves.4... Nf6: Reaching the Two Knights, which often arises following 1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Nf6 4. d4 exd4 5. e5.
moves.5. e5 Ne4: 5. ...d5 is considered to be the main line.
moves.7. Kf1 Nc5: The knight had nowhere else to go, but now the bishop's escape diagonal has become blocked.
moves.8. a3 d5: This move allows white to capture with discovered check.  But, 8. ...Ba5 9. b4 also loses material.
moves.9. exd6 e.p.+ Ne6 10. axb4 Qxd6 11. b5 N: The final mistake.  Black has overlooked that the a-file is now half-open.
